CmdLine: yum update -y &&     yum install -y wget epel-release &&     wget http://li.nux.ro/download/nux/dextop/el7/x86_64/nux-dextop-release-0-5.el7.nux.noarch.rpm &&     yum update -y &&     rpm -ivh nux-dextop-release-0-5.el7.nux.noarch.rpm &&     yum -y install minidlna deluge-web &&     yum -y install python-pip &&     pip install --upgrade pip --no-cache-dir &&     pip install setuptools --upgrade --no-cache-dir &&     yum clean all &&     mkdir -p /home/Videos &&     pip install flexget &&     rm -rfv nux-dextop-release-0-5.el7.nux.noarch.rpm &&     mkdir -p /home/Videos/Movies &&     mkdir -p /home/Videos/TV_Shows
